issue.title: [CF 80] show/hide groups when in vehicle
issue.body:
What is the enhancement in mind? How should it look and feel?

Right now an icon group can be shown or hidden based on combat status.  I'd like to see another option for icon groups based on whether or not you are in a vehicle.

Please provide any additional information below.

We can already show/hide icons based on being in a vehicle, so this request may seem redundant.  Here's why I'd like to see this added:

1)  IMO, combat & vehicles are perhaps the 2 main "states" that you can be in.  Driving a vehicle completely changes what abilities you can use.  It would be much easier to set this for an entire icon group instead of having to add a condition to every icon.  I think this is a state where you will probably want to use it for every icon in a group rather than just 1.

2)  Adding background frames under the TellMeWhen icons using kgPanels (or similar) is a great way to help make the icons stand out.  You can make them show/hide by making TMW or other frames parents.  This doesn't work well by parenting an icon since it will show/hide based on cooldown status.  It does work well with combat status since you can parent the TellMeWhen_Group# frame & check the "show only in combat" option for that group.   Because showing based on vehicle status is in the icons themselves, you can't use vehicle status for the kgPanel frame's parent.


> Posted by CurseForge user Vardelm | Imported from CurseForge issue #80 | Raw
